Reviews.Title: Beware if you live in the Usa K world will not respond to voicemails or emails
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Had a problem with 2 cameras not working , left voicemails on there phone , 3 emails, someone from china answerd me back and told me to contact California ,i said that's what I've been tying to do, tried doing rma on there Web site just to exchange 2 cameras but after filling form out it says sorry were under maintance and it deletes everything you put in it , wired every thing up with there garbage wire it came with, no one responded back to me, not happy with this .night vision really stinks cant see anything ,will not do buisness with them again. Never
